trans-unit.source: Represents a parameter of a method of a hosted ActiveX control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> class using the specified parameter information.
A <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> indicating the parameter information to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> class using the specified parameter information and whether to ignore by reference parameters.
A <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> indicating the parameter information to use.
A value indicating whether to ignore parameters passed by reference.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> class using the specified name and type name.
The name of the parameter.
The name of the type of the parameter.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> class using the specified name and type.
The name of the parameter.
The type of the parameter.
Converts the specified parameter information to an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> object.
An array of <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> objects to convert.
An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> objects representing the specified array of <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> objects.

Converts the specified parameter information to an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> object, according to the specified value indicating whether to ignore by reference parameters.
An array of <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> objects to convert.
A value indicating whether to ignore parameters passed by reference.
An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.AxParameterData"></xref> objects representing the specified array of <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> objects.
Indicates the direction of assignment fields.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.FieldDirection"></xref> indicating the direction of assignment fields.
Indicates whether the parameter data is passed by reference.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter data is by reference; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the parameter data is in.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter data is in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the parameter data is optional.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter data is optional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the parameter data is out.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter data is out; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the parameter.
The name of the parameter.
Gets the type expected by the parameter.
The type expected by the parameter.
Gets the name of the type expected by the parameter.
The name of the type expected by the parameter.
